Public Attributes

int valuetype
 power-up type (-1: life, -2: armor, -3: quaddamage, -4: invisibility, n>=0 && n<=10: ammo for weapon n, n>=10: weapon n-10).

int value
 the amount of ammo, life, armor, etc. given by the power-up.

flyVector colorget
 color that fills the screen when the power-up is picked.

int fadetime
 amount of time in miliseconds for the fade-in effect when the power-up respawns.

int spawntime
 amount of time in miliseconds for the power-up to respawn after being picked.

sound* sndget
 array of sounds for picking the power-up.

sound* sndspawn
 sound for respawning.

flyMesh* objmesh_item
 mesh of the power-up itself.

flyMesh* objmesh_box
 optional mesh for a box that encloses the power-up.

int zrot_time
 time of the z-axis rotation movement of the power-up.

float updowndist
 distance of the up/down power-up movement.

int updowntime
 time of the up/down power-up movement.

float veldamp
 power-up velocity damping factor.

int gettime
 delay of time for getting the power-up after right sfter it is dropped.

int nsndget
 number of sounds for picking the power-up.

flyMesh* objmesh
 mesh of the power-up itself.

Detailed Description

Power-up class for the ship game.

This class implements power-ups that are pickable by the ships.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
